name: Orion Energy Systems, Inc.
description: Orion Energy Systems, Inc. is a leading provider of energy-efficient lighting and energy management solutions. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Manitowoc, Wisconsin, Orion specializes in advanced LED lighting systems that significantly reduce energy consumption and improve the quality of illumination. The company serves a variety of sectors, including commercial, industrial, and municipal markets, offering products that include high-efficiency LED fixtures, controls, and energy management software. Orion's solutions not only help clients save on energy costs but also contribute to sustainability efforts by reducing carbon footprints. Orion is committed to innovation and customer satisfaction, leveraging a team of experts to deliver tailored solutions that meet the specific needs of each client. Over the years, the company has established a strong reputation for quality and reliability, making it a trusted partner in the quest for energy efficiency. Orion also provides comprehensive services, including energy audits and project management, to ensure successful implementation of their solutions. The mission of Orion Energy Systems is to lead the transition towards a more energy-efficient future, enabling businesses to operate more sustainably while enhancing their economic performance.
